column10: Read from memory. Result type is that of second parameter, Byte if not specified
Returns the previous value for the type (nth prior if param 2 given)
Converts the value to a pointer
Reads one or more values from input stream
Reads one or more lines from input stream
Returns the next value for the type (nth next if param 2 given)
Swaps the high and low bytes of the parameter
Writes one or more values to output
Writes zero of more values to output followed by a new line
Returns the character with the given index
Converts the character to lower case
Returns the element count of an array, character count of a string
Returns the index of the given character
